# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session
source.2d372149:
covid19["Date"] = pd.to_datetime(covid19['Date'], format="%Y-%m-%d")
covid19['year'] =covid19['Date'].dt.year
covid19['month'] = covid19['Date'].dt.month
source.0ceb29ab:
covid19_1 = covid19.copy()
covid19_1["Cumulative Deaths"] = covid19_1["Daily Deaths"].cumsum()
covid19_1["Cumulative Still Hospitalised"] = covid19_1["Still Hospitalised"].cumsum()
source.3c09294b:
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize = (24, 24))

plt.subplot(3,2,1)

plt.title("Comparaison de l'évolution du nombre cumulé de cas confirmés de covid 19 à l'année 2020 et 2021.", pad = 12)

sns.scatterplot(x = covid19["Date"],y=covid19["Cumulative Confirmed"], hue = covid19["year"],palette = sns.color_palette("hls", 2))

plt.subplot(3,2,2)

plt.title("Comparaison de l'évolution du nombre cumulé d'individus encore hospitalisés pour le covid 19 à l'année 2020 et 2021.", pad = 12)

sns.scatterplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["Cumulative Still Hospitalised"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette("hls", 2))

plt.subplot(3,2,3)

plt.title("Comparaison de l'évolution du nombre cumulé de décès pour covid 19 à l'année 2020 et 2021.", pad = 12)

sns.scatterplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["Cumulative Deaths"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette("hls", 2))
source.164d0247:
covid19_1["False Positives Found"] = covid19_1["False Positives Found"].fillna(0)

covid19_1["Daily Confirmed corrige"] =covid19_1["Daily Confirmed"] - covid19_1["False Positives Found"] 

y2021_b = covid19_1[covid19_1["year"] == 2021]
y2020_b = covid19_1[covid19_1["year"]== 2020]
source.fd52f1b0:
plt.figure(figsize = (24, 24))

plt.subplot(3,2,1)
plt.title("Comparaison de l'évolution du nombre de cas confirmés par jour de covid 19 à l'année 2020 et 2021.", pad = 12)

sns.lineplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["Daily Confirmed corrige"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette("hls", 2))

plt.subplot(3,2,2)

plt.title("Evolution du nombre de cas confirmés par jour de covid 19 à l'année 2020.", pad = 12)

cs = sns.lineplot(x = y2020_b["Date"],y=y2020_b["Daily Confirmed corrige"])
cs.set_ylim(0,6000)

plt.subplot(3,2,3)
 
plt.title("Evolution du nombre de cas confirmés par jour de covid 19 à l'année 2021.", pad = 12)

csb = sns.lineplot(x = y2021_b["Date"],y= y2021_b["Daily Confirmed corrige"])
csb.set_ylim(0, 6000)

source.7869c2e2:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (20, 10))

#plt.subplot(3,2,1)

plt.title("Comparaison de l'évolution du nombre d'individu encore hospitalisés et requière de l'oxygénation supplémentaire pour covid 19 à l'année 2020 et 2021.", pad = 12)

h = sns.lineplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["Still Hospitalised"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette('husl', n_colors = 2), ax=ax)
h.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(0, 1), loc=2, borderaxespad=1)


h.set_ylim(-2, 6000)

ax2 = ax.twinx()

o = sns.lineplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["Requires Oxygen Supplementation or Unstable"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette(["purple","orange"]), ax= ax2)
o.set_ylim(-2, 6000)
o.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(0.90, 1), loc=2, borderaxespad=1)

source.afaaa6a6:
import numpy as np

cas = covid19_1.pivot_table(values = ["Daily Confirmed","Daily Imported","Daily Local transmission"], index = "year",aggfunc= np.sum)
cas
source.f26a31df:
cas["Daily Imported percent"] = (cas["Daily Confirmed"]/cas["Daily Confirmed"])*100
cas["Daily Imported percent"] = (cas["Daily Imported"]/cas["Daily Confirmed"])*100

cas["Daily Local transmission percent"] = (cas["Daily Local transmission"]/cas["Daily Confirmed"])*100
source.dbefc076:
cas_percent=cas[["Daily Imported percent","Daily Local transmission percent"]]
cas_percent
source.b6672e59:
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

sns.set()

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (15,20))

barWidth = 0.4
y1 = cas_percent.iloc[0]
y2 = cas_percent.iloc[1]

r1 = range(len(y1))
r2 = [x + barWidth for x in r1]

labels = cas_percent.columns.tolist()

avc = ax.bar(r1, y1, width = barWidth, label = "2020")

no_avc= ax.bar(r2, y2, width = barWidth, label = "2021")

ax.xaxis.set_ticks([r + barWidth / 2 for r in range(len(y1))])
ax.set_xticklabels(labels)
ax.set_ylabel("Pourcentage d'individus en %")
ax.set_xlabel("")
ax.legend()
ax.bar_label(avc, padding=3)
ax.bar_label(no_avc, padding=3) 
ax.set_ylim(0,100)
ax.set_title("Pourcentage d'individus contaminé au covid 19 selon le mode de transmission" )
source.785db5dc:
covid19_1['pourcentage population completed vaccination'] = covid19_1["Perc population completed vaccination"].str[0:2].astype(float)


fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (20, 10))
plt.title("Evolution du nombre de cas de covid 19 par jour et le pourcentage d'individus complètement vacciné contre le covid 19 au fil du temps entre l'année 2020 à 2021.", pad = 12)
#plt.subplot(3,2,1)

h = sns.lineplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["Daily Confirmed corrige"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette("husl", 2), ax=ax)
h.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(0, 1), loc=2, borderaxespad=1)


h.set_ylim(0, 6000)

ax2 = ax.twinx()

o = sns.lineplot(x = covid19_1["Date"],y=covid19_1["pourcentage population completed vaccination"], hue = covid19_1["year"],palette = sns.color_palette(["purple","orange"]), ax= ax2)
o.set_ylim(60, 100)
o.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(0.90, 1), loc=2, borderaxespad=1)
